title: House Head
subtitle: National University of Singapore
desc: Lead and coordinated a group of 20 seniors to execute activities for over 85 freshmen.
Planned multiple house cohesion activities to create an welcoming and friendly house identity for the freshmen.

title: Programmes Executive
subtitle: NUS Rotaract Club
desc: Planned a detailed study plan spanning weeks and subjects tailored to the current needs of our partnered school.
Ensured that programmes taught were able to be continued by local teachers after we left.
Lead the execution of the programmes for both the students and the teachers.

title: Event Organiser
subtitle: Rivervale Grove Residents committee
desc: Planned a fully-fledged carnival alongside an exciting stage performance to forge a strong sense of belonging and celebrate Christmas.
Led my team of executives and volunteers to organise and execute the carnival for the families of the Seng Kang GRC.
Liaised with external vendors, businesses and government agencies for sponsorship and activites.
Event was graced by Mr. Charles Chong, then Deputy Speaker of Parliament.
Awarded the Distinction grade for my contribution, the highest possible grade.

title: Event Organiser
subtitle: PAYM Loves Red
desc: Planned a fully-fledged carnival alongside an exciting stage performance to forge a strong sense of belonging and commemorate Singapore's national day
Led my team of executives and volunteers to organise and execute the carnival for the families of the Seng Kang GRC.
Examined and identified opportunities to save cost through up-cycling.
Liaised with external vendors, businesses and government agencies for sponsorship and activites.
Event was graced by Mr. Charles Chong, then Deputy Speaker of Parliament.
Awarded the Distinction grade for my contribution, the highest possible grade.
